source.query:
select distinct group_id from cd_ods.tb_azure_group_info
where snapshot_date =CURRENT_DATE-1

select distinct user_id from cd_ods.tb_azure_user_info
where snapshot_date =CURRENT_DATE

activities.name: Execute_Update
activities.description: DAYS 사용자 라이선스 정보 일일 적재

query.value: select cd_portal.fn_user_daily_log();
select cd_portal.fn_user_info_update();

properties.description:
- 초기 적재시, 월별로 모든 파일 Sink
- 증분컬럼이 DATE 형식

query.value: @concat('SELECT DISTINCT(DATE(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ')) STARTDT FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' ORDER BY STARTDT')
@concat('SELECT * FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' WHERE DATE(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ') = ','DATE(''', item().STARTDT, ''')')
@concat('SELECT * FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' WHERE DATE(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ') = DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL -1 DAY)')

@concat('SELECT sd_id,
 replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(sd_name,char(10), ''//LF//''), char(13),''//LF//''), ''\"'', ''＂''), ''\0'',''''), '','',''//CM//'') as sd_name,
 sd_url,
 site,
 site_id,
 sd_itemid,
 sd_reviewid,
 sd_brand,
 sd_maker,
 sd_ingredients,
 replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(sd_volume,char(10), ''//LF//''), char(13),''//LF//''), ''\"'', ''＂''), ''\0'',''''), '','',''//CM//'') as sd_volume,
 sd_category,
 sd_low_price,
 sd_review_cnt,
 sd_rate,
 sd_low_store,
 sd_store_cnt,
 sd_crawl_time
  FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable)

@concat('SELECT sd_id,
 replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(sd_name,char(10), ''//LF//''), char(13),''//LF//''), ''\"'', ''＂''), ''\0'',''''), '','',''//CM//'') as sd_name,
 sd_url,
 site,
 site_id,
 sd_itemid,
 sd_reviewid,
 sd_brand,
 sd_maker,
 sd_ingredients,
 replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(sd_volume,char(10), ''//LF//''), char(13),''//LF//''), ''\"'', ''＂''), ''\0'',''''), '','',''//CM//'') as sd_volume,
 sd_category,
 sd_low_price,
 sd_review_cnt,
 sd_rate,
 sd_low_store,
 sd_store_cnt,
 sd_crawl_time
  FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable)
@concat('SELECT DISTINCT(DATE(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ')) STARTDT FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' ORDER BY STARTDT')

@concat('SELECT * FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' WHERE DATE(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ') = DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL -1 DAY)')

@concat('SELECT * FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' WHERE DATE(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ') = DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL -',pipeline().parameters.IncDate,' DAY)')
@concat('SELECT DISTINCT(DATE(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ')) STARTDT FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' ORDER BY STARTDT')

@concat('SELECT srd_id,
	sd_reviewid,
	site,
	site_id,
	replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(srd_title, ''\\'', ''＼''),char(10), ''//LF//''), char(13),''//LF//''), ''\"'', ''＂''), ''\0'',''''), '','',''//CM//'') as srd_title,
    replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(srd_content, ''\\'', ''＼''),char(10), ''//LF//''), char(13),''//LF//''), ''\"'', ''＂''), ''\0'',''''), '','',''//CM//'') as srd_content,
	srd_writer,
	srd_writetime,
	srd_rate,
	srd_crawl_time
	FROM ',
pipeline().parameters.SourceTable,
 ' WHERE DATE(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ') = ','DATE(''', item().STARTDT, ''')')
select to_char(date(now()) - generate_series(1,39) ,'yyyy-mm-dd') as STARTDT

@concat('SELECT srd_id,
	sd_reviewid,
	case when site = ''[대상]마켓컬리_STORE'' then ''마켓컬리_STORE'' else  site end  as site,
	site_id,
	replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(srd_title, ''\\'', ''＼''),char(10), ''//LF//''), char(13),''//LF//''), ''\"'', ''＂''), ''\0'',''''), '','',''//CM//'') as srd_title,
    replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(srd_content, ''\\'', ''＼''),char(10), ''//LF//''), char(13),''//LF//''), ''\"'', ''＂''), ''\0'',''''), '','',''//CM//'') as srd_content,
	srd_writer,
	srd_writetime,
	srd_rate,
	srd_crawl_time
	FROM ',
pipeline().parameters.SourceTable,
 ' WHERE DATE(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ') = ','DATE(''', item().STARTDT, ''')')
